name: The Curse of the Everpong
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN ████████████████████████████████████ You are cursed. Cursed with what? The worst curse in the world. A curse so bad, you wouldn't even believe it. What did I do to deserve this? For snapping a ball-paddle. What? You are cursed with the curse of the everpong. ████████████████████████████████████

========================

Controls MovementWASD
JumpSpacebar
PaddleJ
